title: Research Methodology in Comparative Ethnic Studies
description: Theory and practice of research methodology in comparative ethnic studies. Topics include the scientific method, qualitative and quantitative methodologies, and ethical practices. Research report prepared from start to finish, including database searching, collecting pilot data, and proper formatting of a research report. Issues of race in research practice and use foregrounded throughout. 3 lectures, 1 activity.
prerequisites: Completion of Area A, STAT 217, ES 112, junior standing and three courses from ES 241, ES 242, ES 243, ES 244
